name: stoic1b
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), wn(w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w2), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), wn(w2))
-| wi(wa(w0, w2), w1)

|- wi(wa(w0, wn(w1)), wn(w2))
-| wi(wa(w2, w0), w1)

comment: Stoic logic Thema 1 (part b). The other part of thema 1 of Stoic logic; see ~ stoic1a . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 16-Feb-2019.)
